name: async-web-scraper
description: High-performance async web scraper with AWS SQS and DynamoDB

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=apps/analytics && npm run build --workspace=apps/queue
scripts.build:packages: npm run build:types && npm run build:logger && npm run build:aws-wrapper && npm run build:core
scripts.build:apps: npm run build --workspace=apps/analytics && npm run build --workspace=apps/queue && npm run build --workspace=apps/worker
scripts.build:all: npm run build:packages && npm run build:apps
scripts.clean:packages: npm run clean --workspace=packages/logger && npm run clean --workspace=packages/aws-wrapper && npm run clean --workspace=packages/core
scripts.dev:packages: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=packages/types" "npm run dev --workspace=packages/logger" "npm run dev --workspace=packages/aws-wrapper" "npm run dev --workspace=packages/core"
scripts.publish:packages: npm run build:packages && npm publish --workspace=packages/types && npm publish --workspace=packages/logger && npm publish --workspace=packages/aws-wrapper && npm publish --workspace=packages/core
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch:packages && npm run update:packages && npm run build:packages && npm run publish:packages
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor:packages && npm run update:packages && npm run build:packages && npm run publish:packages
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major:packages && npm run update:packages && npm run build:packages && npm run publish:packages

author: iakhator
